description:
When B.B.B. bites a bottom just for a prank, his father bans him from biting. Being told that be can`t bite just makes B.B.B. want to bite even more! When everything around him starts to look like a tasty behind, he can`t take it anymore! Can he keep the promise he made to his father, or will he give in to temptation and bite a bottom? B.B.B.`s "bitelust" has reached its limit!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 限界!? かじり禁止令
